overview: From the outskirts to downtown, Mariano travels through Córdoba on his motorbike. He spends the nights with Constanza riding and hanging around, exploring limited routes through the city. A recent law allows profiling arrests. Between demonstrations and fairs, they bind together emotionally. The city of Córdoba becomes the third protagonist itself, providing the backdrop for these lovers, who have to confront not only the challenges, illusions and disappointments of coming of age, but the brutal reality of ever-present class struggle and police violence in Argentina.
title: Moto
